website_summaries.verdict: Quirks aside, this is a nice set of stickers with impressive variety plus a book kids can use to showcase them.
pros: In addition to more than 1,000 stickers, this assortment comes with a sticker book for displaying the many adorable designs that include everything from food items to animals
You get a wide variety with few repeating sheets
cons: Peeling them carefully is required, otherwise they might rip

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!  AMAZING stickers!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I am a Piano Teacher and I bought these for my students and they will love them!!!! There are soooooooo many different kinds! 40 sheets!!!...and NO two sheets are the same. Way more stickers than shown in picture! I could only upload half the pages because that's the max images allowed. They are the best book of stickers I have ever seen! I bought two books of them and will probably buy more!!! Best stickers ever!!!!!!! And such a great price!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Treat yourself to some super fun stickers!
customer_reviews.text: I am a grown woman in my late 20s, and I absolutely adore this sticker book. I originally purchased these stickers for the purpose of giving them out to my students, but I haven't given one sticker away. I have kept them all for myself and covered my planner with them. They make me so happy! The stickers are high quality, and the book contains a wide variety of styles. Go ahead... treat yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Abbie Lee

customer_reviews.title: Best sticker pack - ever!!
customer_reviews.text: The preview of this absolutely does not do it justice, it's FORTY pages of awesome stickers!! I bought this mostly for decorating my planner and I absolutely love it! I think the unicorns doing yoga is my favorite sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Christina W

customer_reviews.title: **FAV STICKERS EVER! SOOOO CUTE!!**
customer_reviews.text: Omggggg they're seriously so CUTE! I sticker bombed my luggage with this pack as well as some super hero and pop culture packs. I have to say this pack was my fav! I love, love, love all the food stickers. Theres even a narwhal and other instantly adorable designs. I had so much fun doing the carry on luggage that I think I'm going to order more of these packs and do the medium size luggage next! If you have been eyeing up the different "girly" stickers on amazon, SKIP the "planner" options and instead buy 2 of these. The planner stickers are chintzy. cheap, dull and nowhere near the quality or cuteness of these!
customer_reviews.author: Tori Detroit

customer_reviews.title: True book of stickers (but not a sticker book)
customer_reviews.text: I am making a gift that is a throwback to the 80s and wanted a wide variety of stickers like one might have had in that decade. This book sure fits the bill. There are big stickers, small stickers, all colors and themes, and (at least for what I paid) cheaper than buying many packs of foreign knock-offs. Such a wonderful surprise to open it and see all that is included. In case anyone is confused, this is just a book of sheets of stickers. Again, growing up in the 80s, sticker books usually had pages of stickers, and then lots of blank pages to stick those stickers; this does not have the latter.
customer_reviews.author: abky

customer_reviews.title: The cutest but not enough stick to them
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely the cutest stickers! I love the designs and you get a great value for the price. However I bought them to stick to cards,letters,etc that I send out and they don't stick well enough to make it through the mail. I've had to put tape over them. I think they would be good for if its a kids sticker collection and they want to put them in an album or on regular paper, for crafts, etc... but not ideal for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Aharv

customer_reviews.title: Great for Fashion Angels & Lisa Frank Fans!
customer_reviews.text: This is like a cross between Fashion Angels & Lisa Frank. Those are both favorites of mine, & I love stickers too, so I love this! There are some seriously cool stickers here that I think will work well for my scrapbook. I already have one of this book, but I plan to get another! I do recommend this sticker book, especially if you like stickers like these. Fashion Angels has some cool stuff!
customer_reviews.author: bratzlady

customer_reviews.title: Each edition gets better and better !
customer_reviews.text: These books never disappoint. I literally feel like I have all their editions and they just get cuter and better each time my only complaint is the same as usual the unnecessary realistic animal stickers!!!! Waste of pages leave them out other wise great purchase! And easy to remove!
customer_reviews.author: alisa

customer_reviews.title: Great value and good quality stickers
customer_reviews.text: Really cute stickers, just as advertised. Some photo realistic animals, quirky cartoon llamas, a page of minecraft-looking stickers, and some fun "girly" designs. Definitely worth the $7 and I'll be happy to use these for my classroom!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Nice book, but slightly dissapointed in quality control.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves this sticker book. It is very close to the same size as her bullet journal that she is using as a sticker collection book. Unfortunately it came slightly damaged on the corners, but it isn't bad enought to effect the stickers. However, after she had already started using some of the stickers, we noticed that the larger alphabet stickers are cut off a little bit on top, as the page was cut wrong. The edges of the book also have some glue residue, but this doesn't effect the stickers either, it just looks a little dirty. I still recommend this book, but check it before you peel any stickers to make sure none are cut off.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting spectacular quality but I was expecting more cutesy stickers. Two pages are about trash waste (not in an eco-friendly manner) and toilet plungers. One page had a "cute credit card" thoroughly not impressed by this. Would absolutely return if we weren't stuck at home looking for things to do. I tried to post photos but I'm unable to.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoorsymom

customer_reviews.title: YES
customer_reviews.text: I'm incredibly happy with my purchase. I got these to supplement my sticker collection for scrapbooking and I'm so glad I got them. There are so many fun stickers to add a quirky touch to whatever page I'm working on. I probably won't use all of them because the gross out pages just aren't to my taste. Besides that, I think it was a great buy and I'll be able to use most all of them--even if it takes a while.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so much bought two
customer_reviews.text: This book isn’t a cheaply made sticker book and for the price and how many you get you absolutely cannot best it especially when it goes on sale. My two year old is obsessed with stickers and these are great fine motor skills practice. They also come with a variety of different stickers ranging from food to animals and are very bright and colorful. She enjoyed it so much I bough a second for when this runs out! Great buy highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: vanblack

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: We got the first series for our older kid's birthday, she shares the stickers with her younger sister. They love the content and the variety of stickers available for their notebook, letters, laptop, etc... For our younger kid's birthday we decided to get this second series of the stickers. Yes, they love the stickers just as much! We think it's great value, so many stickers, they look cute, and good price!
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: My niece absolutely loved this sticker book :)
customer_reviews.text: PROS: 1. Great value! 2. Stickers are good size! They range small to medium sized and some are big. 3. Good variety. 4. Good adhesion. CONS: 1. There's a page or 2 about pills which maybe a bit off for kids but if it bothers you then I guyss just rip off those pages before giving the kid. Great stickers for scrapbooking :) so colorful!
customer_reviews.author: Woodsiders

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Quality Stickers
customer_reviews.text: Super cute sticker book! There are many different kinds of stickers in this book. Most of them are on the med-large size rather than tiny. I was looking for calendar stickers so this wasn't a good match. However I do not regret the purchase as there are many other things I could use these for. They would be great for scrapbooking or to make a birthday or holiday card more unique. It feels like there are less than 1000 stickers, but who has time to count!? I'm happy with however many there are.
customer_reviews.author: mMeTz

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: These are SO cute!!!! I love that the pages can be removed from the book easily so I basically would give my daughter a page each day and make this booklet last a while. Some of the stickers are really super cute and all the images (print quality) are excellent. They are very thin though, keep that in mind, so they could tear easily if your kid isn't gentle while removing from the sheet...
customer_reviews.author: Tallie Paz

customer_reviews.title: Great Stickers
customer_reviews.text: I teach reading to Kindergarten to 3rd graders and I purchased this book hoping to boost my sticker assortment for incentives. I was not disappointed. My students love this sticker book! I would definitely purchase this book again. The only complaint I might say I would have would be that the pages tear out easy. I had to clip the pages together with a binder clip that fell out. The students don't seem to mind that though. The stickers are so bright and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: Fun for all ages, unless you are that poor parent that has to scrape the stickers off of your car windows. But really, the stickers are fun and a great way to brighten anyone's day... From a child to a 40 something year old (myself) who plans on using them in my planner instead of the typical "inspirational, meet - your - goals, shoot for the moon" stickers meant to remind me I have met none of them! I would rather have fun!
customer_reviews.author: India Dausch

customer_reviews.title: Not all "ridiculously cute"
customer_reviews.text: Definitely an eclectic mix. It would be a stretch to call them all "ridiculously cute". I got them as homeschool motivation stickers for my daughters and there's a few pages that we would never use, and the pages fall out very easily (mine just arrived today and two pages already fell out), but all in all my daughters were excited and it was a decent value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: K&C

customer_reviews.title: Classroom use
customer_reviews.text: Our teachers had stickers on their wishlists and these books are perfect! We ordered 2 versions. I love how they will stay neatly in the book but they can tear a page out if they want. There's a mix of "girl/boy" stickers. Even though they're all cute. This will be a definite reorder for us to give to the teachers.
customer_reviews.author: NJJO

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adorable. Great for any sticker lovers!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this after already getting my daughter the "Series 2" of these books and seeing how fun the stickers were and how much she loves them. Lots of different styles and fun themes. Fun for lots of ages of sticker lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Jenova VII

customer_reviews.title: Mostly cute stickers - be aware though
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for incentives for summer school work. I ended up needing to just give certain pages because some of the stickers were inappropriate for kids (there were a few pages of poo, rotting garbage, and underwear... maybe I just don’t understand the kids these days, Lol). The remaining stickers were a hit though.
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: Just too kiddie style for my taste.
customer_reviews.text: It’s really difficult to find sticker books that are styled/designed for adults, or with more adult-like graphics. My rating for this item is a reflection of my personal taste toward the content and not at all a reflection of the seller, since they shipped it very quickly and sold it for a great value and so on..
customer_reviews.author: Laura Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Eh.
customer_reviews.text: The first two pages were stuck together lol and on the first page a sticker was scratched up. No biggie. I love the pages w the smaller pictures so I can fit them in my planner. The pages with the cat & dog faces are a waste. Idk why anyone would want or need that. But overall it’s a cute sticker book, do I think it’s worth it ? No..would I buy it again...probably not lol.
customer_reviews.author: alisa

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 3yr old Granddaughter ... she loves stickers. Maybe have been a little bit of evil mother revenge ... But my daughter is loving getting them off the walls. But on a serious not. These would be great for teens doing journals, decorating things. Nice quality of stickers, sticks well.
customer_reviews.author: January

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these stickers. She gets a sticker every time she uses the potty. The last stickers we had she was able to wear on her skin but the adhesive on these is a lot stronger so we had to switch to putting them on her clothes instead. They seem great if you’d like them to stay on something for a while like a water bottle, etc.
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Stickers for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to send to my students in the mail after schools closed due to COVID. I love the fun designs. It's a cute little sticker book with a lot of stickers at a reasonable price. They have lots of different designs and it reminded me of when I was a kid and wanted to collect stickers. My students enjoyed receiving pages in the mail.
customer_reviews.author: SLe

customer_reviews.title: SUCH CUTE DESIGN ON ALL OF THESE STICKERS!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this sticker book for my niece’s 11th birthday. She LOVED the variety of stickers! They are so versatile and adorable! I found myself wanted to keep it for myself! She enjoyed looking through each of the pages as soon as she opened this. She said she could not wait to but some of these on her school supplies, water bottle, etc.
customer_reviews.author: carabetha

customer_reviews.title: I don't hate this, not one bit
customer_reviews.text: I needed stickers. I wasn't sure what kind of stickers, but I knew I needed stickers. This book has stickers. So many. And very good ones. One weird thing is that the book I got was bound backwards/upside down. But it's a sticker book, so who cares! Pleased with the options, you cannot go wrong here. I am an adult, but it would make a great little gift for a tween in your life, too. Will not hesitate to order again for gifting/stocking stuffer/Easter basket/back-to-school fun.
customer_reviews.author: agc

customer_reviews.title: A lot of bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: Where else can you get 1000 fun stickers for about $5 ? This set is definitely for the younger crowd. Kids we know love getting stickers in their letters. OK, adults do, too! We gifted some of these by the page to some youngsters and some young-at-heart, and they were so excited to get them.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the Price
customer_reviews.text: You'd be surprised at how expensive stationery can get, but this notebook has plenty of fun stickers for an amazing price! Unlike other stickers aimed at children, these are super adhesive. You can create really nice scrapbooks because the stickers are FUN! Not childish, but very FUN! :-) Will definitely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These are just as great as the first book! I love the variety and the vibrant colors. These are good quality stickers and my niece and nephews love them! I only have one complaint, and that is that there aren’t as many gender neutral stickers as the first book. Most of these are feminine.
customer_reviews.author: Ragamuffin

customer_reviews.title: Bright and colorful
customer_reviews.text: The stickers were nice and thick and tore away from backing easy without ripping them. The book was smaller than I had thought (journal size vs composition size) but still packed with lots of stickers for the kids (and granma ) to enjoy- very broad and diverse amount of subject matter to satisfy all kids
customer_reviews.author: T. George

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I like these most, because they are super sticky. I was worried they would be like the vinyl, reusable stickers and they ARE NOT. They are regular, sticky stickers which is exactly what I wanted. My kids love he designs and love sticking them on envelopes and letters for friends.
customer_reviews.author: jfamatl

customer_reviews.title: sooooo many fun stickers
customer_reviews.text: i hand out stickers at the end of every tball practice. this book is perfect. each page is a different set of awesome stickers that are so cute and fun. i handed out stickers to 11 kids, 3 times a week for 3 months and still have tons of stickers left
customer_reviews.author: Dana Dane

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: The book was smaller than I thought but it’s still really nice. It has cartoony stickers, learning stickers, realistic cute animal stickers, it has it all! My daughter will be 3 soon. She loves putting stickers on some of her toys plus she has a wall in her play area dedicated to stickers only!
customer_reviews.author: Rosy

customer_reviews.title: A friendly game
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a habit of putting banana and other fruits stickers in hidden places for me to find. It annoys me, so my daughter bought these stickers to add to the frustration, lol. But they have a nice selection and im sure i will get a laugh or 2 when i discover these placed throughout my home in random places..
customer_reviews.author: Yost Fams

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I need some cool stickers as my daughter is potty training. This book is filled with tons of different stickers. We use it on her “potty training tracker” and she’s thrilled to look at all the great stickers to chose from. This would be GREAT for teachers too. It has lot of different types, shapes and sizes.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Two whole pages of poop and trash stickers
customer_reviews.text: Most of these stickers are super cute! There’s a great variety and I like that they’re different than the typical “good job” stickers that you use for kids’ classes. However, I wish there weren’t two whole pages of trash and poop stickers! What a waste (pun intended) of two pages!!!! At least the pages are easy to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M

customer_reviews.title: Best buy for cool, cute, fun stickers
customer_reviews.text: This is the book of stickers that can be given to ANYONE, little boy, little girl, and even adults! There's enough stickers for scrapbooking, rewarding good behaviour, to share, or in my case I made a keepsake box that will now be covered with stickers, just sooooo many things you can do with this book and so much you can share!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Presnell

customer_reviews.title: VERY CUTE stickers, great variation, will purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: The stickers are absolutely adorable, both my daughter and I love this sticker book. The pages are loaded with various stickers, some repeat but not enough for it to be a downside. They stick VERY well but are just as easy to remove. I will definitely be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Marinelli

customer_reviews.title: Great gift- My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Great collection, very colorful with a wide range of stickers. The stickers are easy to peel off and don't tear.
customer_reviews.author: odelia chorin

customer_reviews.title: Stinkin cute !!
customer_reviews.text: I found them at Walgreens a little cheaper BUT anyways idc this is too stinking cute. Some sticker books say they have so many stickers but all the pages are teeny tiny ones. No this ones awesome ! SO many stickers ! Super cute. So many designs and ideas. I’d for sure get again love it.
customer_reviews.author: Breana

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these since my daughter has recently become obsessed with stickers. These were definitely a hit! She can spend hours putting stickers on her arms and legs and me and my husband and her face and I don’t even care that they end up all over my couch, carpet or hardwood floor since they’re sooo easy to peel off! The stickers definitely are super cute and they’re fun to play with! I’d definitely buy these again and recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adorable and a great value!
customer_reviews.text: This book is jam packed with tons of adorable stickers. My daughter was so excited looking through all the pages with me and choosing which sticker was her fave from each page. There are a TON of stickers included. This is a fantastic gift, and well worth the price tag!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica5144

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd book I have purchased for my students. Great Product, LOTS of Fun choices to choose from and good quality. :)
customer_reviews.author: JulBug32

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sticker book
customer_reviews.text: Fun looking stickers in a small book. We took these traveling with us and they were perfect. Great for playing, making cards etc. The variety is good- different sizes, types, animals, letters, shapes, etc
customer_reviews.author: Phillyfan

customer_reviews.title: Great adhesion
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got into these bad boys and it took me a while to pull them off of everything. Adhesion is great. A couple of my pages were hard to get them off and actually tore them. There’s definitely a lot of different styles and sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Dyer

customer_reviews.title: So freaking cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these stickers so that I could include them on letters that I write to my niece. They are so cute! The only exception is one page that for some reason has to do with trash and poop? Who decided to put that sticker page in there?
customer_reviews.author: mayg19

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT QUALITY STICKERS.....
customer_reviews.text: I received these ADORABLE STICKERS very quickly and in great condition. There are soooo many different subject matters in these STICKERS. My preteen granddaughter will love them for XMAS. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND. ENJOY & KEEP SAFE!!!
customer_reviews.author: KRIS TENNESSEN

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The value is great, there are so many stickers! I bought this for my toddler for craft time and it keeps him entertained for quite awhile, the stickers are easy for him to peel off of the sheet and put on paper. Money well spent, I might have to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Value for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for stickers to decorate my planner and journal with. These stickers are perfect and so is the price. I found so many cute stickers in this book without too many repetitions of them. These stickers are goofy in the best way possible.
customer_reviews.author: Lemonade

customer_reviews.title: Okay for Price
customer_reviews.text: It has some great stickers for your money, but I feel like it also wasted some money. If I wanted alphabet stickers and label like stickers I would’ve just bought those. It could’ve added more cool and fun stickers as a substitution.
customer_reviews.author: Amber C.

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Fun sticker book. Not easy for my young kids to remove from the pages. Thinking these are geared more towards elementary girls. My boy toddler did find some he liked; but no dinosaurs, sports, or vehicles...the poop page was it.
customer_reviews.author: Eah Waggs

customer_reviews.title: Fun stickers for everyone
customer_reviews.text: We were able to grab this book of stickers at a great price that has so many fun stickers! The Fashion Angels 1000+ Ridiculously Cute Stickers has 40 pages of all different stickers for kids. Very happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: citrushome

customer_reviews.title: enough stickers to keep anyone happy!
customer_reviews.text: really nice themed pages that are varied and often suprising. my kids loved the various themes and have picked favorites. lots of pages and the stickers are of a suprising good,thick quailty. i really didn't expect them to be as high quality.
customer_reviews.author: alpex

customer_reviews.title: Good variety, fun themes
customer_reviews.text: My almost-4-year-old son is a big fan of stickers. I wanted to find good variety, and this fit the bill! Lots of fun pages with different themes. The pages tear out easily, so it’s easy to store the book away and take out a few pages at a time (if you’re like me and don’t want the novelty to wear off immediately and end up with stickers covering everything in your home). The stickers are also pretty easy for a kid to take off themselves. Good purchase, would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: EMP1985

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Omg I just got my sticker book today you will not be disappointed! I am a whole grown woman and I am obsessed with it! It is super cute! but girly lol whether your a teacher, a parent, a life coach, or a therapist I think this is super cute for your planner or appointment book. It would also be a great gift for a teenage girl thumbs up buy it :-)
customer_reviews.author: J.Saint

customer_reviews.title: 1000 Plus Stickers!
customer_reviews.text: So many fun stickers in one book!!! My daughter loved sticking these all over the house. The stickers stick pretty good It’s not cheap stickers. This would make a great gifts for people who like to make scrapbooks. For the price you get so many stickers and did I mention how cute they are!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: SO MANY STICKERS!!
customer_reviews.text: I expected there to be a bunch of duplicates and there isn't! Theres maybe 5 pages of tiny emojis with some duplicates but thats it. Art is cute, quality is awesome. EXCELLENT value!!! Will make a great Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.author: SonicSweeti

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic but not as sparkly as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: it's wonderful comes with alphabet stickers which I had no idea has taco day stickers cactus stickers all kinds of stickers for all kinds of categories they're just going to fun and silly and they look really delightful I thought more of them were going to be sparkly and they're not giving the outer package so I'm a little sad about that
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Nice for kids, too easy to disperse
customer_reviews.text: Nice price for 1000 stickers. Many interesting patterns inside. My son loves it so much. My white sofa being colorful now. Only this is this ‘book’ too easy to disperse. Pages are fall apart everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: kyra

customer_reviews.title: 1000+ awesome stickers
customer_reviews.text: I spent forever looking for a good deal on stickers because I love to decorate my notebooks and I am so happy that I picked this booklet. It’s very current with the trends and humorous and I can’t wait to use all the stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Tacothecatemily_official

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Some pages were super cute. Some were super NOT. Like two pages of garbage, a page of emojis, etc. Basically several pages are full of stickers I find unusable. But that said, the books is full of adorable stickers too. It’s a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: S. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Good stickers
customer_reviews.text: They are great stickers. The pages are themed and they are easy to tear out each page if needed. My 4yr old loves then and has no problem doing it herself. I like that you can tear out a page, we have been sending them in letters to cousins.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: This sticker book was perfect! The value is excellent. You get a ton of great quality stickers for less than $7. Plus the variety of types of stickers is awesome. Daughter loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Nice selection and good value...
customer_reviews.text: Contains stickers from about a quarter of an inch Stars up four inch animals. Some line drawings, some photo style, fantasy animals, real animals, a set a small and large alphabet stickers as well.
customer_reviews.author: L. Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Cute Stickers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sticker book to use for the kids I tutor and it was so worth it! I always incentivize them to focus on their work so that they will be able to pick a sticker or two at the end of our sessions. There are so many different kinds of stickers in here for all ages and interests. My one complaint would be that there weren’t many “boyish” stickers as my one kid would say. Would definitely buy this again or a sticker book from the same brand.
customer_reviews.author: Emma F.

customer_reviews.title: The amount of stickers and variety you get isn't bad for the price point.
customer_reviews.text: The paper quality is just okay and a little cheap looking for things like scrapbooking. It's okay for cards, writing notes, or things that are temporary. For the price though it's not bad. Not great for little kids though b.c. they are hard to peel and easily rip if not careful. But overall very cute stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my little girl; she adores it.
customer_reviews.text: My expectations were exceeded with this thing; despite it's claims of "1000+ ridiculously cute stickers", I still only expected an 'okay' return... after all, this is only eight bucks. But yeah, no, this booklet is packed to the rafters with stickers, and they are the most adorable little designs. Someone drew these stickers with a love for what they do, it shows. Easy five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Winchester

customer_reviews.title: Lots of unusable stickers.
customer_reviews.text: We received this book and my kids were excited but after a bit they came to me because a bunch of the stickers. 8 pages in fact were off cut. So they stamped the outlines in all kinds of weird places making the stickers totally unusable. They were disappointed but since they had already used a bunch of pages we can't really return it.
customer_reviews.author: LauraMichele Gardner

customer_reviews.title: DON’T PUT ON SKIN!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The stickers are okay, but if you have small kids I wouldn’t get these for them. My daughter likes to stick them to her skin and she put some on my hubby and I. Both of our skin started to tingle the slightly burn. I’m not sure what the adhesive is, but it isn’t skin friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Tameka

customer_reviews.title: great sticker variety
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old has a sticker book and it is one of her favorite past times to "play" by making pictures with stickers. These are cute and really well made. There is a huge variety as well. Some girly and some more geared towards boys/gross. Although she loves them all
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie S

customer_reviews.title: Great sticker book
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old daughter absolutely loves this sticker book. She asks for it multiple times a day. Really cute and quirky stickers in a lot of different sizes. Great value for $5
customer_reviews.author: Ratchet&Spank

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for potty training!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! I bought these for my daughter for potty training and these are going to work perfectly! There are like 40 sheets of all different types shapes and sizes. I will definitely purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: Micah Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: Not glitter stickers
customer_reviews.text: These are the Amazon Choice sticker packs when you search GLITTER STICKERS and although the stickers are cute and I will keep them, I wanted glittery stickers, and there was not 1 glitter sticker in there.
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia Escoto

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: good quality. Very cute stickers. It is more for girls. Pretty bunnies, unicone, smiling faces, letters, rainbow... Kids love it. My friend got it with a little bit cheaper price though, at the same day.
customer_reviews.author: Elliana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for potty training and keeping kids husy
customer_reviews.text: Lots of little stickers, some large ones, great for the $5
customer_reviews.author: TJ Rowbotham

customer_reviews.title: ITS SO CUTE
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the most adorablest sticker book ever! Every page is something different. I purchased to put pages in orders that I send out for my online business (@noorsluxeboutique), and I’m about to order like 2 more for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Tulani

customer_reviews.title: I would rebuy!
customer_reviews.text: These are seriously the cutest stickers I’ve been able to find in a book. I sent some of them to my niece in the mail because of quarantine.. and she cried. The price for the amount of stickers is beyond reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Regular stickers - will fade if they get wet if you’re looking for water bottle stickers maybe go for something else BUT if you just want stickers these are awesome!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality for Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good price for the amount and quality of stickers! Perfect for anywhere from a young child to a journaling teen and more. The designs are quirky and fun. Very good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great stickers
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yo sticker-obsessed daughter loves these stickers. They are easy for her to remove. Some of the stickers are funny which she loves. The shear number of stickers is a definite bonus! This book is more expensive than the first book in this series but it is nice to get a different set.
customer_reviews.author: D. Thorley

customer_reviews.title: my 3 year old LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves it! she has a bucket full of stickers! The different types of shapes, animals, food, etc on the stickers are helpful because she gets to learn and practice naming them.
customer_reviews.author: Mark E King

customer_reviews.title: For Kids
customer_reviews.text: I'm not in love with these stickers; I feel the variety isn't exactly what you would want for what's supposed to be adorable. The quality isn't that great either the stickers rip too easily. I am returning because they don't work for my bullet journaling as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Williams

customer_reviews.title: Cute Stickers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these stickers as a gift for my baby niece.I think she is going to love them.They look so cute and she loves stickers.I have no idea how well they stick but they look good!
customer_reviews.author: Good Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Book, so many options
customer_reviews.text: I use these daily to decorate cute notes to neighbors, I also use them on birthday cards. There are so many different themes to choose from. There are also several sizes in each theme.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Fun stickers!
customer_reviews.text: There are stickers with all kinds of themes. Most are really cute. The reason I cut one star is that this is not as appropriate to be used for rewarding a child with stickers. Many of the stickers are too big for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Y.A.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Get them. I bought these to help potty train my daughter. They're so many to choose from! I legit wish I was a kid and had this sticker book growing up(;_:)
customer_reviews.author: Caprice S.

customer_reviews.title: Great book of stickers
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun book of stickers. There is a wide variety of styles and all of them are cute and fun. They peel off easily that the children are able to do it without the help of an adult. Its not a book that has repeats of stickers so that was also a nice aspect.
customer_reviews.author: kayla wohletz

customer_reviews.title: Lots of stickers
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of different varieties of stickers in this book. They would be fun for a potty training chart, or a gift. They have a cartoon look, which makes them fun for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Jolley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and adorable
customer_reviews.text: I love them! Stickers are so expensive nowadays but this has soo much variety and for such a low cost! Took a few photos of the variety that you get, there’s definitely more!
customer_reviews.author: Celin Artoonian

customer_reviews.title: Good gift option for any girl/teen!
customer_reviews.text: The title literally is correct- totes adorbs. These stickers were a perfect gift option for my 5th graders. I was able to tear out multiple, multiple sheets (like 5x7 size) of various styles of stickers and mail out to a whole class of girls. They are so cute.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Moore

customer_reviews.title: The most adorable stickers
customer_reviews.text: All these stickers are really cute!! They’re great for kids (mainly girly stickers though) up to adults. I’m 26 and these are adorable and make me happy lol. Every page is really good and I was surprised. And you can’t beat the price. I would buy again. I think there were probably 2 pages I didn’t really care for but other than that, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Chianna

customer_reviews.title: Good value but with strong smell
customer_reviews.text: Valuable set and my daughter enjoyed it. but the book has strong bad glue smell. I was worried if it’s bad for kids. I suggest put outside a little bit to get rid of the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn11

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for kids!!!
customer_reviews.text: These stickers are in a thick booklet. Beautiful colors and designs. High quality. My 2 year old son loves stickers so I'm going to gift these as a little present for his birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan n chad

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Obsessed with these stickers. Not all pages were cut correctly and are not usable.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE STICKERS! I bought another one by same publisher from a different seller but both are amazing. So funny. So cute. Obsessed. My only complaint is that some of the pages are cut incorrectly and are unusable because the cut does not line up with the images. Would have given them 5 stars if it weren't for this...
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Terrible smell
customer_reviews.text: These stickers are a great value for the money, but the book had such a strong unpleasant odor that I had to leave it propped open outside for a few hours to try and air it out.
customer_reviews.author: Justin C.

customer_reviews.title: Great stickers
customer_reviews.text: My boys loved these stickers. They came with a lot of options and they were super cute. They didn’t stick the bad way and didn’t chip off either. Great product for its price
customer_reviews.author: Violetteland

product_meta.title: Fashion Angels 1000+ Ridiculously Cute Stickers
product_meta.description: Color:Ridiculously CuteAbsolutely everything you have always dreamed about in Sticker is included in the 1000+ ridiculously cute stickers book from Fashion Angels. This fabulous collection of Ultra cool stickers, thought bubbles, cactus, unicorns, Emoji, pizza, puppies, kitties, narwal, and so much more We just can't even. Decorate greeting cards, notebooks, planners and more with this book of over 1000 stickers. It is probably the most amazing thing ever. Recommended for ages 6+
feature_bullets: Decorate greeting cards, Notebooks, planners and more with this book of over 1000 stickers
Great for teachers looking to add to papers, or give out as prizes
Everything you have ever wanted from a sticker book!
